milestones.title: Project Initiation and Planning
milestones.description: Initial client consultation, Site inspection and assessment, Development of project plan and timeline, Procurement of necessary permits and approvals

milestones.title: Material Procurement
milestones.description: Selection and purchase of roofing materials, Delivery and storage of materials on site

milestones.title: Roof Removal
milestones.description: Removal of the existing roof, Disposal of old roofing materials, Site cleanup

milestones.title: Roof Installation
milestones.description: Installation of new roofing materials, Waterproofing and sealing of the roof, Installation of flashing and gutters

milestones.title: Project Completion and Cleanup
milestones.description: Final inspection and quality assurance checks, Cleanup of the project site, Final client walkthrough and sign-off
